snippet.textDisplay:
Well it does kinda the same mistakes like Castlevania: Lords of Shadow.
1. Trys to be something else (Zelda)
2. Doesn't really got much to do with Starfox. Actually it's based on a game for the Nintendo 64 called Dinosaur planet
3. Looks pretty
4. Ignoring 1 and 2, it's actually a decent game.

Much like Castlevania LoS

snippet.textDisplay: One of the most underrated soundtracks by far. The folks at Rare have done another fantastic job! It is a bit of a shame that the game turned out as Starfox Adventures opposed to Dinosaur Planet, but still, even with the moments that made this game stick out too much (Arwing fights basically. Without them I would have been perfectly content with this title one hundred percent.) its fantastic. Darn I need to play this again, at the very least for the scenery porn.

Without them I would have been perfectly content with this title one hundred percent.) its fantastic. Darn I need to play this again, at the very least for the scenery porn.

snippet.textDisplay: @XxGonixXFAN SMB was my very first video game, and I grew up with a NES and Genesis, I'm not new to video games. snippet.textDisplay:
"Zelda is just your favorite one, so don't try to believe that it's the best if you don't like people challenging your posts. "

Yes, thats my point! Thats why I said it's just a SUBJECTIVE OPINION! Because YOU stated earlier that Zelda is not one of the best Adventure franchises out there, as if it was fact! My god, are you an idiot?

And yes, I know that the newer Zelda games are easy, and it irritates me. But there are many other reasons that makes it my favourite franchise.
snippet.textOriginal:
"Zelda is just your favorite one, so don't try to believe that it's the best if you don't like people challenging your posts. "

Yes, thats my point! Thats why I said it's just a SUBJECTIVE OPINION! Because YOU stated earlier that Zelda is not one of the best Adventure franchises out there, as if it was fact! My god, are you an idiot?

And yes, I know that the newer Zelda games are easy, and it irritates me. But there are many other reasons that makes it my favourite franchise.

snippet.textDisplay: @Project Exodus: And you haven't played a lot of action/adventures have you? If you did, you'd then realize that Zelda is easy (except the first two) and simple compared to other action/adventure games out there. Zelda is just your favorite one, so don't try to believe that it's the best if you don't like people challenging your posts.
snippet.textOriginal: @Project Exodus: And you haven't played a lot of action/adventures have you? snippet.textDisplay: Arguably the most underrated game of all time. Fun as hell, eye-melting graphics, excellent soundtrack, and fantastic gameplay. Just because it's very different from other Starfox games doesn't mean that it sucks. In fact, I like this much better than Assault or the DS one.
snippet.textOriginal: Arguably the most underrated game of all time. Fun as hell, eye-melting graphics, excellent soundtrack, and fantastic gameplay. Just because it's very different from other Starfox games doesn't mean that it sucks. In fact, I like this much better than Assault or the DS one.

snippet.textDisplay: The game was pretty good when considered alone. The problem was it was trying to be Zelda when Zelda was already around, and doing it better. It was certainly a good looking game, especially during the rain, and the soundtrack worked too. Just a shame it wasn't better received.
snippet.textOriginal: The game was pretty good when considered alone. The problem was it was trying to be Zelda when Zelda was already around, and doing it better. It was certainly a good looking game, especially during the rain, and the soundtrack worked too. Just a shame it wasn't better received.
